name: bestow
effect: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
short_effect: Gives the user’s held item to the target.

flavor_text.x-y: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
